Package com.brightcove.drm.widevine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WidevinePlugin.ConstraintsColumns  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcquireRightsTask
    This class performs license acquisition and retrieves rights for the protected Source from the DRM server.
    CheckRightsStatusTask
    This class checks whether the given rights-protected Source has valid rights for the specified DrmStore.Action.
    RegistrationTask
    This class registers the device with the DRM server.
    RemoveAllRightsTask
    This class removes rights for all rights-protected Sources managed by the DrmManagerClient.
    RemoveRightsTask
    This class removes rights for the given rights-protected Source.
    WidevineEventType  
    WidevinePlugin
    This class implements the DrmPlugin interface for Widevine rights-protected content.
